description: This file implements a React component for the restaurant detail page in a food delivery application. It fetches restaurant data by ID, displays restaurant info, menu categories and items, and manages the cart interactions within the client-side application.

methods.name: groupMenuByCategory
methods.description: Groups menu items into categories based on certain keywords in their names, such as 'Seafood' or 'Grill & BBQ'.

methods.name: RestaurantDetailClient
methods.description: Main React component for the restaurant detail page, fetching data, managing state, and rendering UI elements.
